description.value:
As you lack the ability to fly, you have grown more capable in the wielding of your wings and feathers in turn.
As an action, choose two items or pieces of equipment held or strapped on to a creature, aside from armor. That creature must make a Strength (Save) check of DC 10 + your Proficiency Bonus. On failure, the creature must choose which of the two things you listed to let go of, as the wind catches it and flings up to 30ft in a direction of your choosing.
You regain the usage of this ability at the end of a long rest.
